channel.title: +Ger-man on भाषान्तरेषु विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +Ger-man on भाषान्तरेषु विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Old norse
item.description: Modern icelandic grammar is pretty close to old norse, but pronunciation has drifted. Stress is on the first syllable. a अ ǫ (संवृत्त-अकारः) á आकारः संवृत्तः (vs Modern icelandic ow) æ (as in “mad” german ä) i इ í ई e ऎ é ए u उ ú ऊ (german ü) y यु ý यू o ऒ ó ओ ø ऍ (Arnold Schwarzenegger saying bird, german ö), long ǿ = œ ei as in rain ey = øy as in gluey au औ Consonants þ = थ्, ð = ध् z = त्स् (as in german) f (in word beginning or doubled) = फ़्.
